_aChangeLog.text: The planks on the windows have now a strength value of 25 (previously had the double).
The stronger planks on the big window of the second floor have now a strength value of 50 (previously had 75).
A new window was made on the stairs from the lobby to the second floor.

_sText:
Greetings to all. This is the first attempt at a target map I make. It is the second version of a map that I had previously completed but from which I decided to continue later. I tried to make it as complete as possible and at the same time develop it in a closed environment, since at the moment I still need to learn how to handle myself outdoors.
Other than that, the map is based on an abandoned house. It is dark, medium to large in size and has a basement and second floor.
Terrorists have taken the place to hold their prisoners. Counter-terrorists must intervene in their actions and end them by ambushing the building. The priority, beyond neutralizing enemies, is to safeguard the lives of hostages.
I hope my work is to your liking. Any opinion will be duly appreciated. From already, thank you very much!

Thanks to:
-LucasFacu for testing the map and helping me improve it.

-Patrick de Arteaga for providing me with the music present on the map.
(his music is free, visit his page if you like: https://patrickdearteaga.com/es/index-es/).

-Chesterfield, since from him I was able to get the hostage skins present on the map. The one who ported these skins to CSS was originally vad36. Credits to both for their respective actions.

NOTE: If you want to uninstall the hostage skins then go to the "cstrike" folder of the game, then go to "custom" and there delete the folder called "my_custom_stuff". If you already have any other modifications installed, then you have to delete the folders of the files individually:

-materials > models > player > Vad36Hostage (delete)
-models > characters (delete)

(Sorry if my english was not too fluent or clear)
